description: The first 3 times your creatures die, they are resurrected with 25%, 50%, and 100% {STAT_health}. Your creatures cannot be resurrected by any other means. Your creatures' on-resurrect effects can activate only once at a time. This perk is always active while your specialization is {SPEC_GRAVEBORN}, even if you haven't allocated any Perk Points to it.
name: Somnus
